import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, Heart, MessageCircle, PlusSquare, Menu } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Input } from './ui/input'; const TopNavigation = ({ searchFocused, setSearchFocused }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showNotifications, setShowNotifications] = useState(false); return (
{/* Logo */}
Instagram
{/* Search */}
setSearchFocused(true)} onBlur={() => setSearchFocused(false)} />
{/* Right icons */}
{/* Notifications dropdown */} {showNotifications && (

Notifications

john_doe liked your photo.

2h

jane_smith started following you.

5h

)}
); }; export default TopNavigation;
